mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (uid, ex_key, provider, upw, unm, age, unn, profileImg, auth) VALUES (#{uid}, #{ex_key}, #{provider}, #{upw}, #{unm}, ${age}, #{unn}, #{profileImg}, #{auth})
mapper.delete: delete from t_user where uid = #{uid} and upw = #{upw}
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(A.i_user) FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_review B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_user = ${i_user}) AS countMyReview, (SELECT COUNT(A.i_user) FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_review_cmt B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_user = ${i_user}) AS countMyReviewCmt, (SELECT COUNT(A.i_user) FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_reply B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_user = ${i_user}) AS countMyReply FROM t_user WHERE i_user = ${i_user}
mapper.delete: DELETE t_sub WHERE sub_ing_user = #{i_user} and sub_ed_user = #{sub_ed_user};
mapper.select: SELECT A.unn AS 닉네임, A.profileImg AS 프로필사진, A.regdt AS 가입일자, A.introduce AS 자기소개 FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_sub B ON A.i_user = B.sub_ed_user WHERE B.sub_ing_user = #{i_user};
